title: Ep. - 420 - THE RISE AND FALL OF LULAROE 90 DAY FIANCE: BEFORE THE 90 DAYS
description:
Stephanie McNeal from THE RISE AND FALL OF LULAROE, a revealing new documentary on Discovery+ that pulls the curtain back on the multi-level marketing company and features interviews with retailers, warehouse workers, designers and others whose lives were profoundly impacted by the organization. The film explores the psychological techniques used by multi-level marketers, and how the company harnessed the full power of social media to onboard a massive pool of retailers.

 

Chris Farah and Kate review the season premiere of 90 Day Fiancé, Before the 90 Days, which follows couples who have an existing relationship online, but haven't met in person. 

 

Kate reviews And Just Like That on HBO Max, the Sex and The City reboot.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
